The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 18 April is 41,670 (4,823 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 April, there were 149 new confirmed cases (17.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 April, there were 117 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 27% (32 extra cases).
